descricao: Lecturing for +200 students in the nationally recognized best beneficent course in Brazil;
Looking forward to changing the lives of 14/15-year-old low-income people;
Producing custom, original and engaging educational material
Part of the team driving advancements in autonomous flight;
Developing and training datasets for precise target recognition;
Implementing gesture-based control systems for seamless flight
Actively participating in competitive programming and programming marathons;
Experiences in hackathons, fostering innovative solutions;
Exploring Web 3 technologies for decentralized applications
Lecturing for underprivileged individuals aspiring to enter university;
Contributing to the Nóiz Projeto Social to support community education
